documentation.title: SocialButton Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: Social network, share on social network, social share, share on facebook, share on twitter, share on linkedin, share on google++
documentation.metadescription: KoolSocialShare is a great control to share your page on different social networks all at once with no hashes. VIEW IT NOW!
documentation.description: Show LinkedIn button with count of people who like your page.

property.name: ImageSrc
property.shortdesc: Set the custom image for social button.
property.longdesc: Set the custom image for social button.

property.name: Text
property.samplecode:
<?php		
	$socialshare = new KoolSocialShare("socialshare");

	$button = new SocialButton("Facebook");
	$button->Text = "Share on Facebook";
	
	$socialshare->Add($button);
?>

property.name: Tooltip
property.samplecode:
<?php		
	$socialshare = new KoolSocialShare("socialshare");

	$button = new SocialButton("Facebook");
	$button->Tooltip = "Share on your Facebook";
	
	$socialshare->Add($button);
?>

property.name: CssClass
property.shortdesc: Set custom css class for button.
property.longdesc: Set custom css class for button.
property.samplecode:
<?php		
	$socialshare = new KoolSocialShare("socialshare");

	$button = new SocialButton("Facebook");
	$button->CssClass = "my_facebook_cssclass";
	
	$socialshare->Add($button);
?>

...

<style>
	.my_facebook_cssclass
	{
		border:solid 1px blue;
	}
</style>

method.name: __construct
method.samplecode:
<?php				
	$socialshare = new KoolSocialShare("socialshare");
	$socialshare->styleFolder = "KoolControls/KoolSocialShare/styles/default";
	$socialshare->scriptFolder = "KoolControls/KoolSocialShare";
	
	$socialshare->Add(new SocialButton("Facebook","Share on facebook","Share on facebook");
	
?>
